```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)
library(FPKMcalc)

# Simulated data
counts <- c(1000, 1500, 300)
gene_length <- c(1000, 2000, 500)  # in base pairs

fpkm_values <- calculate_fpkm(counts, gene_length)
fpkm_values

```
 

# Plotting FPKM Values

```{r}
barplot(fpkm_values, names.arg = paste("Gene", 1:3),
        col = "skyblue", main = "FPKM Values",
        ylab = "FPKM", xlab = "Genes")

```
